entries.journal_entry_description: EV-9D9 has had three droids escape his care. He believes that they are taking refugee inside of a storage facility run by the Darklighters. EV -9D9 wants you to first place a pain bolt on the droids and then destroy them. One of the droids to find and eliminate is LIN-34, before the transport escapes..
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: LIN-34 is attempting to escape Tatooine. EV-9D9 has given you the task of destroying the transport that is carrying her wayward droid.
